verbs.description: [ARG1: The new epoch] [V: envisioned] [ARGM-LOC: here] [ARG0: by President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] may be one in which the US loses its grip on Asia and then the world . In that vision , the new future will most likely be ruled from Beijing , not Washington .
